::Magmatron::

    "Trust me, you get much more than just quarters." Magmatron said pointing 
to a monitor of his weapons room. "Please follow me into the conference room."
    As they entered Magmatron began his speach. "First and foremost I would 
like to welcome you to the Destron forces. I and Bazooka are some of the 
original Destrons. We have no connection to the Decpticons, although we did 
at one point. We all under went a procedure that will prevent the destruction 
of us if the Decpticons were destroyed in the past. This only went down 
recently after we learned that the Maximals and Predacons were fighting on 
past Earth. Now if you decide to join me then I will have you under go the 
same procedure It will remove all traces of Autobot or Decpticon within you. 
Shredder, I can give you a beast mode if you wish for one, although you seem 
to not need one. Now as for you Mantella I can change your beast mode to 
something more powerful. Whatever you prefer."
